select new com.jshx.mxbz.entity.Signs(t.id, t.signsType, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.signsNo, t.signsName) from Signs t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.signsNo like :signsNo
and t.signsName like :signsName
and t.signsType = :signsType
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and ( t.companyName like :searchLike or t.signsName like :searchLike)
order by t.createTime desc
